channel.title: Comments on: A Departure From My Normal Hairstyle

item.title: By: GA Otis
item.dc:creator: GA Otis
item.description: Russell, want to talk to you about the Obama 3am text for a story. Please e-mail me at gotis@nypost.com asap. On deadline, am a reporter for the NY Post. Thanks.
item.content:encoded:
Russell, want to talk to you about the Obama 3am text for a story. Please e-mail me at gotis@nypost.com asap. On deadline, am a reporter for the NY Post.
Thanks.

item.title: By: Gerret Stranz
item.dc:creator: Gerret Stranz
item.description: Yes, you that face could really have some nice short hairstyle. The sorter style of hair will help to focus on life, not the styling.
item.content:encoded:
Yes, you that face could really have some nice short hairstyle.
The sorter style of hair will help to focus on life, not the styling.
